scotland is one of the best places in
the world to go camping not only is it
wild and beautiful and open it also has
the best camping laws anywhere here in
scotland you can go on private land or
public land without needing any permits
or permission you can hike bike even
camp build campfires all that stuff is
completely legal whether the land is
private or public
as long as you use some good common
sense and practice and leave no trace
